text: Peregrine Cust may refer to: *Peregrine Cust (1723–1785), Member of Parliament for Bishop's Castle (1761-1768), New Shoreham (1768-1774), Ilchester (1774-1775) and (1780-1785), and Grantham (1776-1780) *Peregrine Cust (1791–1873), Member of Parliament for Honiton (1818–1826) and Clitheroe (1826–1832) *Peregrine Cust, 6th Baron Brownlow (1899-1978), soldier and politician
title: Peregrine Cust
